name: immoral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 morally wrong, or outside society's standards of acceptable, honest, and moral behaviour: an immoral act immoral behaviour It's an immoral tax, because the poor will pay relatively more. Compare
amoral
moral adjective immoral earnings UK
money earned from prostitution (= having sex in exchange for money): live off immoral earnings If convicted, she could be jailed for five years for living off immoral earnings.
